subject: Re: reading html hyper links as per directory structure
body:
On 5/15/07, perl pra  wrote:

> If I could get the names of the hyperl inks that are displayed in the html
> file as per directory structure then I could tar/.gz the files,. But I have
> no idea of html parsing using perl.

Have you looked on CPAN?

    http://search.cpan.org/

Maybe you want HTML::LinkExtor?

    http://search.cpan.org/dist/HTML-Parser/lib/HTML/LinkExtor.pm

Hope this helps!

--Tom Phoenix
Stonehenge Perl Training
